casebody.data:
Fred Heller, appellee, v. North American Union, appellant.Gen. No. 26,832.Action on a certificate of insurance on the life of plaintiff’s wife. Judgment for plaintiff. Appeal from the Municipal Court of Chicago; the Hon. Bernard P. Barasa, Judge, presiding. Heard in this eourt at the Mareh term, 1921.Affirmed.

McSurely, J., dissenting.

Opinion filed March 7, 1922.Daniel S. Wentworth and David B. Maloney, for appellant. T. Ered Laramie, for appellee. Mr. Presiding Justice Dever

delivered the opinion of the eourt.
